author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Department of English of KSR Institute for Engineering and Technology inaugurated ELTAI Namakkal chapter at function held recently.

K. Elango, secretary, ELTAI and former Professor of English, Anna University, Chennai, inaugurated the chapter. In his presentation on ELTAI, Mr. Elango spoke about the benefits which could be attained through ELTAI. Further, he explained ELTAI activities in detail.

K. S. Rangasamy, chairman, KSR Educational Institutions, presided over the function.

M. Venkatesan, principal, KSR Institute for Engineering and Technology, stressed on the importance of English language in the modern era.

Measures

In his keynote address, V. Radhakrishnan, principal, K.S. Rangasamy College of Arts and Science, made an emphasis on the barriers which the learners faced and the remedial measures to overcome them.

C. Muhuntarajan, Associate Professor and Head, Department of English of KSR Institute for Engineering and Technology, and R. Srinivasan, chairman-cum-managing trustee, Aarthi Educational and Charitable Trust, offered felicitations.

As a part of the function, a workshop was organised on “teaching – learning vocabulary: Lexical approach” and Mr. Elango was the resource person.
title: ELTAI Namakkal chapter inaugurated
